info.name: Facebook Wide
info.description: View Facebook at the full width of your browser / widescreen monitor
info.additionalInfo:
Facebook Wide v3.7

Expands Facebook to the full width of your browser / widescreen monitor!

Enjoy!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Also available on userscripts.org
http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/98350

Please note; only the userscript version will notify you when an update is available,
so if you use Greasemonkey, you are advised to install from that site!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
